channel.title: Projects on Engineers Without Borders
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Engineers Without Borders

item.title: Nyange Electric Wagon (2018)
item.description: With a narrow width and fold down sides, this modular electric wagon has been optimized to carry clay for our community allowing them to use their time more effectively.

item.title: Nyange Tile Press (2017)
item.description: This custom tile press was designed to increase the quality and quantity of tiles made by our community, thereby allowing them to sell the tiles for more money.

item.title: Nyange Water Filtration (2019-2022)
item.description: We are working to provide a secure and sustainable drinking-water system that can filter for bacteria, parasites, turbidity, and nitrates, and control water distribution.

item.title: Valley Verde
item.description: We are aiming to design an efficient and cost effective irrigation system to water seedlings for the local non-profit organization, Valley Verde.
